metadata.description:
"An original saga from an Eisner-and-Shuster winning team: Cameron Stewart and Karl Kerschl.

Dive into 19th-century Russia with Assassin Nikolai, star of Assassin's Creed Chronicles: Russia!

This explosive thriller reveals the truth behind Tesla, the Tunguska Event, and the Great Purge of the Assassins!"
metadata.name: Assassin's Creed: The Fall & The Chain
